sentences.en: A number of considerations have led her to a willful abortion.
sentences.cn: 出于多种考虑她执意要堕胎.

sentences.en: A willful man must have his way.
Even the best ones can be foiled, though, by a sufficiently willful programmer committed to ignoring basic principles of memory management.
sentences.cn: 但是，即使最优秀的编程人员也可能会被忽略内存管理基本原则的非常任性的编程人员搅乱。

sentences.en: He displayed a willful ignorance of their plight.
sentences.cn: 对于他们的困境他故意装作一无所知.

sentences.en: He's been willful and headstrong from a baby.
Her laughter and fragrance and willful glances were his tribute.
sentences.cn: 她的欢笑、温馨和秋波也是献给他的.

sentences.en: His adolescent protest consisted of willful neglect of all his responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 他的青春期反叛包括故意疏忽他的所有责任.

sentences.en: Is such a willful and unreasonable.
sentences.cn: 就是这样的任性和不可理喻.

sentences.en: Mu Dan triumphs by a willful ignorance of the old classics.
sentences.cn: 穆旦的胜利却在他对于古典经典的故意的无知.

sentences.en: Patterson describes Koko's personality as willful and stubborn:'she loves babies and young people.
sentences.cn: 佩特森说,科科的性格是任性而固执的, “ 她喜欢小孩和年轻人.

sentences.en: The green eyes in the carefully sweet face were turbulent, willful, lusty with life, distinctly at variance with her decorous demeanor .
sentences.cn: 那双绿色的眼睛生在一张甜美的脸上，却仍然是任性的，充满活力的，与她的装束仪表很不相同。

sentences.en: The willful boy ran away wildly along the winding path.
sentences.cn: 那个任性的男孩沿着弯曲的小道疯狂地跑走了.

sentences.en: The willful killing of a person is murder.
There is a willful self-destructiveness in the air here as if America has all the time and money in the world for petty politics.
sentences.cn: 这里的空气里中弥漫着一种故意自我毁灭的气息，为了狭隘的政治，美国好像在全世界有的是金钱和时间。

sentences.en: Willful people cannot tolerate the slightest frustration of their wishes.
sentences.cn: 任性的人不能容忍他们的愿望遭受哪怕是最小的一点挫折.
今日不节约,明日即缺之.

words.tran_cn: 乐意的；自愿的；心甘情愿的
意志；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿
乐意；心甘情愿；自动自发
决心；用意志力驱使；将（财产等）遗赠某人（will的现在分词）
决心要；遗赠；用意志力使

phrases.tran_cn: 故意的不良行为 条约法律；渎职

trans.tran_cn: 任性的，固执的，故意的，存心的
